title.narrative: Championing Gender Equality, SRHR, and Girls and Women Support to Women Deliver’s Work Program 2021 – 2023

description.narrative:
The project aims to: create and empower young advocates from developing countries and to ensure that these actors have the skills, knowledge and access to advocate for change for women and girl in their local environment, while at the same time creating high-level political policy windows that bring investments in SRHR and gender equality to the forefront of the global political arena.
Women Deliver generate data-based arguments and advocacy products in order to push political and financial policymakers to invest in the wellbeing and the health and rights of women and girls. Besides WD own advocacy, they leverage data and evidence to equip particularly young advocates, influencers, and decision-makers with evidence, tools, messages, and resources to affect change; and providing platforms for gender equality and SRHR stakeholders to come together.

sector.narrative: Women's rights organisations and movements, and government institutions

description.narrative: FL §06.36.03.11 SRSR activities with international civil society organisations

policy-marker.narrative: Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention on Biological Diversity
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention to Combat Desertification
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation
Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

title.narrative: Output 2.1.1 Women’s rights organizations, youth, and marginalized communities from ODA-eligible countries supported to participate in skills-building tools, and resources for policy influencing and advocacy for gender equality and/or SRHR

Number and percentage of women’s rights organizations, youth, and marginalized communities from ODA-eligible supported to participate in skills-building trainings, tools, and resources for policy influencing and advocacy for gender equality and/or SRHR
Sub indicator: # of youth convenings, multicountry workshop or workshops

actual.value: Results coming in end of 2022 as agreed with the partner organisation.

title.narrative: Output 4.1.3 Improved knowledge amongst Women Deliver staff of lessons learned, promising practices, and challenges emerging from project implementation

Two Learn, Pause & Reflect sessions held a year with Women Deliver-wide team
Sub-indicator: # of Learn, Pause & Reflect (LPR) sessions held

actual.value: Results coming in end of 2022 as agreed with the partner organisation.

title.narrative: Output 4.1.1 Suite of evidence products on gender equality and SRHR developed in accordance with priorities of women’s rights organizations, youth, and marginalized communities

Number of evidence products on gender equality and SRHR developed in accordance with priorities of women’s rights organizations, youth, and marginalized communities in ODAeligible countries
Sub-indicator: # of evidencebased advocacy tool or investment case developed

actual.value: Results coming in end of 2022 as agreed with the partner organisation.

title.narrative: Output 1.1.1: Supported women’s rights organizations, youth, and marginalized communities from ODA-eligible countries to contribute to identifying and leveraging policies for gender equality and/or SRHR

Number and percentage of instances where women’s rights organizations, youth, and marginalized communities from ODA-eligible countries supported to identify and leverage policies for gender equality and/or SRHR
Sub-indicator: # of instances of support provided to women’s rights organizations
Output 3.1.6 Communications campaigns created and used to profile policy and advocacy messages of women’s rights organizations, youth, and marginalized communities from ODAeligible countries

Number of communications campaigns created and used to profile policy and advocacy messages of women’s rights organizations, youth, and marginalized communities from ODA-eligible countries.
Sub-indicator: # of GE and/or SRHR campaigns to amplify policy and advocacy messages of women’s rights organizations, youth, marginalized communities

actual.value: Results coming in end of 2022 as agreed with the partner organisation.

title.narrative: Output 1.1.2. Supported women’s rights organizations, youth, and marginalized communities in ODAeligible countries to participate in and influence gender equality and/or SRHR policies, programs, or practices at the governmental, intergovernmental, regional, or organizational level

Number of women’s rights organizations, youth, and marginalized communities in ODAeligible countries supported to participate in and influence gender equality and SRHR policies, programs, or practices at the governmental, intergovernmental, regional or organizational level.
Sub-indicator: # of instances of support provided to Young Leaders for policy and advocacy speaking engagements.

actual.value: Results coming in end of 2022 as agreed with the partner organisation.

title.narrative: Output 2.1.4 Advocate-friendly tools to roll out global guidelines and frameworks for gender equality and/or SRHR adapted and disseminated for women’s rights organizations, youth, and marginalized communities from ODA-eligible countries

Number of times advocate-friendly tools to roll out global guidelines and frameworks for gender equality and/or SRHR are adapted and disseminated for women’s rights organizations, youth, and marginalized communities from ODA-eligible countries

actual.value: Results coming in end of 2022 as agreed with the partner organisation.

title.narrative: Outcome 2: Strengthened capacity and knowledge amongst women’s rights organizations, youth, and marginalized communities from ODA-eligible countries to influence regional policies, programs, and resource allocations for gender equality and/or SRHR

Increased capacity and knowledge amongst women’s rights organizations, youth, and marginalized communities from ODA-eligible countries to influence regional policies, programs, and resource allocations for gender equality and/or SRHR
Outcome 4: Strengthened evidence-base for supporting women’s rights organizations, youth, and marginalized communities in evidence-based gender equality and SRHR advocacy
Extent to which women’s rights organizations, youth, and marginalized communities used Women Deliver curated data and evidence for gender equality and SRHR

Outcome 3: Strengthened and deepened partnerships and alliances with women’s rights organizations, youth, and marginalized communities from ODA-eligible countries to define and leverage key gender equality and/or SRHR policy windows

Number and percentage of women’s rights organizations, youth, and marginalized communities from ODA-eligible countries engaged in the process of defining and leveraging key gender equality and/or SRHR policy windows
Output 3.1.1 Increased participation of delegates from ODA-eligible countries at global gender equality and SRHR convenings (WD2023)
Percentage of delegates from ODA-eligible countries participating at global gender equality and SRHR convenings (WD2023)

actual.value: Results coming in end of 2022 as agreed with the partner organisation.
